data.title: Sidney Luft
data.meta_description: Michael Sidney Luft (November 2, 1915 - September 15, 2005) was a Jewish-American impresario.
data.text:
Born:

Michael Sidney Luft

November 2, 1915

Manhattan, New York City, New York, U.S.A.

Hometown:

New Rochelle, New York, U.S.A.

Death:

September 15, 2005 (89 years old)

Santa Monica, California, U.S.A.

Occupation:

Impresario

Years active:

1947-2004

Parents:

Leonora Luft (deceased)

Norbert Luft (deceased)

Wives:

MaryLou Simpson (m. 1940-1942)

Lynn Bari (m. 1943-1950)

Judy Garland (m. 1952-1965)

Patti Hemingway (m. 1970-1971)

Camille Keaton (m. 1993)

Children:

with Lynn:

John Luft (b. 1948; son)

with Judy:

Lorna Luft (b. 1952; daughter)

Joey Luft (b. 1955; son)
